      • reorder

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> reorder(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sentWords)
        Reorders sentences based on a certain relationship between them.
        Parameters:
        sentWords - a list contains sentences, where a sentence is a list of words
        Returns:
        a list of indexes representing the order of these sentences

      • nearestNeighbour

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> nearestNeighbour(double[][] matrix,
                                                                 int startNode)
        Reorders a list of elements based on the nearest neighbor This method uses a matrix of similarities to reorder the elements starting from an index; It returns a list of reordered indexes
        Parameters:
        matrix - a matrix of similarities between each two elements
        startNode - start point (index)
        Returns:
        a list of indexes representing the order of these elements

        Returns:
